Text: Thank God you are back with another super upload! .. gets a little boring when you aren't uploading lol ... can i ask if you will be uploading the rest of the cars laser disc ... boy didn't that technology take off!

I ripped the rarest videos from that laserdisc, but i do have better quality versions of the rest of the promo videos from web downloads, so i was going to post those in the future instead. (searching for a quality "Touch and Go" promo video for ages now)
